content.prompt: The “Atlanta Compromise” is the name given to the

choices.label: proposal that African Americans emphasize making economic progress over the quest for political and social equality
political concessions southern White politicians made to African Americans in order to win their support against northerners
southern agreement to supply raw materials to the North and West in exchange for manufactured products
political deal made by northern Republicans and southern Democrats to pass legislation favoring the gold standard
agreement expected to forge a new Republican Party of northern moderates and southern conservatives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
